feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:32 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 07:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle near noon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
